item.title: By: josephscott
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2020/03/03/vinyl-records/#comment-200288">Mike</a>.
Lost and broken needles are definitely a problem I don't miss.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mike.

Lost and broken needles are definitely a problem I don’t miss.

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: I still have a crate of vinyl records and a turntable. The problem is my needle always gets broken by the grandhcildren! :)
